Name: Silur
Notes: New king rising from Ordovician devastation

Name: Chelicer
Notes: Father of Silur

Name: Animus
Notes: Animal kingdom ancestor addressed by Silur

Name: Eurypter
Notes: Son of Silur

Name: Chasmas
Notes: Son of Silur with different evolutionary path

Name: Belangkas
Notes: Son of Chasmas climbing onto land from sea

Name: Xiphos
Notes: Son of Chasmas

Name: Myriapus
Notes: Earlier arthropod failing at terrestrial colonization

Name: Soliber
Notes: Son of Belangkas succeeding in terrestrial adaptation

Name: Opiliona
Notes: Daughter of Belangkas

Name: Millipa
Notes: Early millipede daughters grazed by Opiliona

Name: Granny Long Legs
Notes: Nickname for Opiliona (harvestmen/daddy longlegs ancestor)

Name: Granny Harvest
Notes: Alternative name for Opiliona's farming activities

Name: Daddy Long Legs
Notes: Modern descendants of Opiliona (harvestmen)

Name: Harvestmen
Notes: Modern arachnids descended from Opiliona

Name: Pneumaran
Notes: Son of Soliber with breathing adaptations

Name: Kitzi
Notes: Small but strong son of Soliber

Name: Solaran
Notes: Sun-associated son of Pneumaran

Name: Acares
Notes: Dwarf son of Pneumaran

Name: Sarco
Notes: Son of Acares

Name: Trombo
Notes: Son of Acares with mixed peaceful and parasitic descendants

Name: Solifugon
Notes: Son of Solaran

Name: Ricinulon
Notes: Son of Solaran

Name: Byblos
Notes: Book Knight son of Kitzi

Name: Paras
Notes: Small son of Kitzi with hunting descendants

Name: Book Scorpions
Notes: Descendants of Byblos protecting books from pests

Name: Mesos
Notes: Hunter son of Paras seeking prey globally

Name: Holoxos
Notes: Blood-drinking son of Paras walking among death

Name: Arachnus
Notes: Earlier arachnid lineage member

Name: Thyrus
Notes: Peaceful son of Holoxos drinking only blood of the dead

Name: Ricinus
Notes: Dark son of Holoxos becoming parasitic tick ancestor

Name: Lilith
Notes: Scorned woman whose blood brings disease through ticks

Name: Midichlorians
Notes: Bacteria living in tick mitochondria

Name: Malarius
Notes: Disease daughter of Lilith (malaria)

Name: Lyme
Notes: Disease daughter of Lilith transmitted by ticks
